titleStmt.title: SII 8.185: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 185. (A.R. No. 589 of 1902). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pukaḻmātu viḷaṅka jeyamātu virumpa malarmakaḷ puṇara nilamakaḷ vaḷara Urimaiyiṟ ciṟan=ta maṇimuṭi cūṭi miṉavar nilaikeṭa villavar kulaitara vikkalaṉ ciṅkaṇan melkaṭal pāya tikkaṇaittu
n tan cakkara nāṭātti virasiṁhāsanattu puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kovirājakesarivanmarāṉa cakravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevarkku yāṇṭu vatu
tiṉacin=tāmaṇivaḷanāṭṭu kalāṟkkūṟṟattu kiḻkūṟṟu brahmadeyam Aṉpil jalacayanattu paḷḷikoṇṭāḻvāṟkku Ivvūr peruṅkuṟi mahāsabhaiyom Ittevarkku tiruviḻāppuṟamāĀka viṭṭa nilam Ivvū m coḻanvāyttalaikku kiḻakkum tirunaḷḷāṟuuṭaiyān vāykkālukkut teṟkum ḷḷattukkum meṟkum kāverikkulaikku vaṭakku nānūṟṟuvamacakkal nilam Araiye Iraṇṭumāvum
jalaśayanattup paḷḷikoṇṭāḻvār koyilil ninṟum vaṭakku nokki poka karuṇākaraperunteruvukku meṟkum tirunaḷḷāṟuṭaiyān vāykkālukku teṟkumkāverikulaikku vaṭakkuk kucanallanteruvukkuk kiḻakku cirāmamacakakkal nila mukakālum Āka nilam Ōṉṟe Eḻumāvum devaṟkku vaṭa m tirunāḷ Eḻun=taruḷa Innila Iṟaiyili viṭṭamaiyil Innilattil Ittiruviḻā
vukku Uṭalākak koṇṭu cakravartti tirumeni kalliyāṇatirumeni Ākaveṇumenṟu tirukkoṭināḷ Eḻuntaruḷuvippān pāratāyan parameśvaran Ātittatevan tirumuḷaināḷ Eḻun=taruḷuvippān Āveṇi cirāman cen=tan Āṇṭānāṉa cāvān=ti koṟṟanārcāvānāyaṇan munṟānāḷ Oloccan vāsudevaṉ kārimāṟan nālānāḷ pālāśriyan ceṭ ṇi Aiñcānāḷ Oloccan jātavedan nārā
yaṇan Āṟānāḷ Āṇṭān nakkakanārāyaṇan Ēḻānāḷ pāratāyan puruṣottamanaṅki Eṭṭānāḷ pāratāyan nārāyaṇaṉ nāraciṅkan Onpatānāḷ pāratāyan tiruvaraṅkanārāyaṇan caṅkaran Ippaṭi cey nāḻiyil śrīvaiyiṣṇavaṉ Anniyāyappaṭṭum Ittiru nāṅkaḷum Eṅkaḷ An=vayattārum can=tirātittavaṟ Ubhaiyamāka vi ttukkoḷḷappeṟuvārāka Ipparicu
Innāḷkaḷ Eḻun=taruḷuvikkakkaṭavomānom Ivvaṉaivaom .. Ivvūr tirunārāyaṇaviṇṇakar Āḻvār paṅkunit tiruvoṇam cakravartti tirumeni kalliyāṇatirumeni yākaveṇumenṟu Aravi k koccayannāy niṟpār Eḻuntaruḷḷuviyyā llavaraiyan cūḷa tiruvāṇai puvanamuḻutuṭaiyār śrīpātam Ivvūr ṭṭantiruviti Akalam Onṟaraik koli
lum kucanallanteru Orukolu tirumaṭaipaḷḷi munṟaraikkolum perun=teruvininṟum kāverikkulaikke Uṟavum Ivvūrin kiḻai kulottuṅkacoḻantiruviti Onṟaraikkolum tiruvālan=tuṟaiUṭai
yār koyililninṟum vaṭakku nokki tiru vāykkāli luṟa Onṟarai kolum Itan meṟkku koṭātavācakan tiruviti patineṭṭunāṭan tiruvitikke Uṟa pokiṟa Erikiḻ kālum Āka Ittiruvitikaḷum teru
vukaḷum Iṟaivin=ta mel Ivaiyiṟṟukku Aḻivucevār tiruvāṇai puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyā rāṇai nānūṟṟuvar rakṣai .. Ivvūr jalacayanattu paḷḷikoṇṭāḻvār koyilile kūṭṭak kuṟaivaṟak kūṭi Irun=tu sabhāvyavasthai cetu Uvāttukkalam viṭṭa nilamāvatu . Ivūr vāyttalai vāykkālukku meṟkku coḷen=tiraciṅka lukku teṟkku Itiṟ kuṟai Ikkoyil vaṭameṟkkoṭi
teṟkku Oloccan nārāyaṇan vāsudevan nilam Itaṟku kiḻpāṟkellai vāykkālukku meṟku Oloccan cāttan kovintaṉ nilattukku vaṭakku tiruvaraṅkatevan nilattukku kiḻakku vāykkālukku teṟku Inaṭuppaṭṭa nilam nā
kālukku vaṭakku Iraṇṭaṟutikku meṟku meṟppaṭiyān nilam mukkāṇiyum Āka nilam 1/4 kālum Inilam Iṟaiyili ceytamaiyil Innilam Anupavittu Iraṇṭu pātamum Otuvikkakaṭavārākavum Inilam Uḻukuṭikaḷu
Eppeṟpaṭṭa Iṟaiyum Iṟukkakaṭava nallātānāka Ipparicu Eppeṟpaṭṭa Iṟaiyum Iḻutti Innilam Uvāttukalamāka viṭṭom Immahāsabhaiyom In=ta Uvāttukkalam viṭuvitta Ivvūrkku ṭaittu vāykkālkaḷ keṭṭamaiyil koṭāta
ttu tiruvālan=tuṟaiUṭaiyāṟkum Ippaḷḷikoṇṭāḻvāṟkkum tirunārāyaṇaviṇṇakarāḻvāṟkkum tiruviḻā Eḻuntaruḷuvikkakkaṭavavarākak kal veṭṭivittu tiruvitikaḷum tiruviti viḻāppuṟaṅkaḷum kaṇṭu kalveṭṭuvittum maṟṟum Ivvūṟku Aḻaku ku
ruppaḷḷittoṅkal Uṭaiyāril kuṇavāyil Uṭaiyān kotai Uyyavan=tānāna Uttamacoḻa viḻupparaiyan Ivvanaiyum Ivanan=vayattāraiyu mutukaṇṇāĀkak koṇṭu viṭṭom Ivvūr mahāsabhaiyom . Itu nāṅ
Digital edition of SII 8.185 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
